Content for CWE ID: 89

Checkmarx Rule

QueryId : 417
Cwe : 89
IsExecutable : true
IsEncrypted : false
Severity : 1
PackageId : 25
Status : Original
Type : Regular

Source

 CxList possible_db = Find_DB_Heuristic();

if (possible_db.Count > 0)
{
	CxList db = Find_DB();
	CxList sanitize = Find_SQL_Sanitize();
	result = All.FindSQLInjections(Find_Read() + possible_db, possible_db, sanitize);
	if (result.Count > 0)
	{
		result = All.FindSQLInjections(Find_Read() + db, db, sanitize);
	}
}
